alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Marion County through 800 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Citra to 7 miles northeast of Rainbow Lakes Estates. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Fort McCoy, Citra, Lake Delancy, Sparr, Anthony, Reddick, Flemington, Lowell and Burbank. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion; Western Putnam
